THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.How the thumbnail visually reinforces th: The thumbnail and title both caution viewers about making mistakes or being uninformed before undergoing IVF. The thumbnail's large 'BEFORE IVF' text emphasizes timing, mirroring the title’s urgency. The use of sperm/egg visuals directly ties into the IVF topic, and the instructor-figure suggests medical authority and personal experience, reinforcing the 'What I Wish I Knew' aspect.
THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Any contrasts or mismatches between thum: There are no significant mismatches; both communicate a warning and an opportunity to learn tips ahead of IVF, with visual and textual urgency.
